function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of respiratory virus transmission via interior surfaces due to occupant hand-surface contact","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in the built environment","Mitigation":"Control occupancy rate, minimize accessible surfaces, improve cleaning frequency and efficiency","Technologies":"BIM-based simulations, cleaning disinfectants, surface materials","People":"Building occupants, healthcare facility staff","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"}]}
